document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/PAK/Electoral Cycle Support to the National Election Commission of Pakistan.pdf

donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: The project's main focus is provision of technical assistance to strengthening the Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP), building momentum for electoral reform and supporting ECP to implement a comprehensive civic education strategy, focusing on women and youth. The project has an electoral cycle approach and encompasses pre, during and post election periods.

The project's main focus is provision of technical assistance for the needs identified by the Election Commission of
Pakistan (ECP) to the Needs Assessment Mission and Project Formulation Mission. The project spans over a period
of 3 years.

Output 1: Increased capac ity of the election commission to deliver its Strategic Plan
Output 2: Electoral laws and procedures strengthened for increased administrative
effectiveness
Output 3: Improved engagement of citizens, particularly women and youth, in
electoral processes

project_descr: Strengthening the institutional capacity of the Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP), building momentum for electoral reforms and supporting ECP to implement a comprehensive civic education strategy, focusing on women and youth
project_title: Election Cycle Support to the Election Commission of Pak
